summary: Remove annoying and repetitive chatter from Cicero.
descriptionHtml:
Cicero Shut up! by suomipoi

Remove annoying voice from Cicero!


============================
How to suggest improvements
============================
Download CICERO DEBUGG.rar and reply to thread \"Strings that Should be removed\". It can be found in the discussion area.



========
Contents
========
There are two main files in the release.
- Main File: Removes repetitive monologue
- Optional: Doesnt talk to you when you talk to him.


=============
Installation:
=============
Extract to Data folder.


================
Uninstallation:
================
Remove the folder: \"maleuniquecicero\" from \"Data\\sound\\voice\\skyrim.esm\\\"


===========
Change log:
===========
30.10.2012	v1.0
- Removed repetitive monologue from Cicero.
- Released files:
   1. Main File - General annoyance removal
   2. Optional - Cicero wont talk to you even if you talk to him
   3. CICERO DEBUGG - Tell me the string name and I fix it if I can.


BUGS
===========
BUG: Cicero won\'t talk even during main questline

Solution : Uninstall mod. Re-enable the mod once the questline is complete.
author: suomipoi
